text:
The best way to prevent a viral infection is to get vaccinated. As a community on this ‘World Health Day’ let’s encourage people who are eligible, to get vaccinated to prevent the spread of COVID-19.

#WorldHealthDay #WorldHealthDay2021 #WHD2021 #WHD #COVID19 #COVIDー19 #vaccine https://t.co/UrOZac6Aho
